metadata.synopsis: PAD for Open Hand Temple quest. When players get the key to be used in the Flophouse at Wyrm's Crossing, but they don't know for sure, this AD will sound when they are near the Flophouse to link the key with the building itselfs.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start the open hand temple quest, get the key S_WYR_OpenHand_ShiftersFlowerKey_8ab130ef-4fad-4bfe-b667-f4a73c1c36c0 and then enter in this trigger S_WYR_Flophouse_FlowerTrigger_c93fb7b7-9807-4b72-b9a7-71ca9f79e524

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I recognise that floral motif - same as that key we found.
